de.thkoeln.bibl.api.validation.impl

Class BibliothecaMediaValidator<T extends AbstractMediaNumber>

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.thkoeln.bibl.api.validation.impl.BibliothecaMediaValidator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - the type of media number used by the SISIS media.
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    AdaptedValidator<BibliothecaTag,SisisMedia<T>>

    public class BibliothecaMediaValidator<T extends AbstractMediaNumber>
extends java.lang.Object
implements AdaptedValidator<BibliothecaTag,SisisMedia<T>>
    Implements a validator for bibliotheca tags which checks against a SISIS media object.

    • Constructor Detail

      • BibliothecaMediaValidator

        public BibliothecaMediaValidator(java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,SisisMedia.BorrowState> afiMap,
                                 java.util.Map<java.lang.Integer,SisisMedia.LoanAbility> loanMap)
        Initialize a new BibliothecaMediaValidator with required the information.
        Parameters:
        afiMap - a map with AFI tag values and the associated borrow state
        loanMap - a map with status tag values and the associated loanablility

    • Method Detail

      • validate

        public ValidateResult<BibliothecaTag> validate(BibliothecaTag tag,
                                               SisisMedia<T> media)
        Validates the Bibliotheca tag against the SISIS media and vice versa. The validation includes signature validation, media type validation, media parts validation, loanability status validation and borrow state validation if the tag supports the AFI.
        Specified by:
        validate in interface AdaptedValidator<BibliothecaTag,SisisMedia<T extends AbstractMediaNumber>>
        Parameters:
        tag - first object to validate
        media - second object to validate
        Returns:
        a result as ValidateResult
